Module bestSokobanEverV6
Package controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
controller.GameController
public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
This singleton class is responsible for communicating with model and handle keyboard input. Its asks game model for certain or notify the game model to update game data
Author:
Shuxiang Hu

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private static GameController gameController
    The unique instance of the singleton class
    private GameModel gameModel
    Holds all data related to the game

      public void handleKeyInput​(javafx.scene.input.KeyCode code)

      Parameters:
      code - keyboard input
